website_summaries.verdict: A liquid dewormer solution that dogs love, but it's not effective on all types of worms.
pros: Works on puppies 2 weeks and older
Same bottle can be used on small and large dogs
Liquid solution that you can mix in with food
cons: Doesn't work on tapeworms or whipworms

customer_reviews.title: The professional wormer
customer_reviews.text: I run a kitten rescue. From what the vets have told me and from my own research, pyrantel palmoate (strongid) is the absolute best wormer. This is a wonderful, reasonable version of that safe wormer. Extremely safe and extremely effective. I would never risk using a less-safe product. This is the only one our rescue uses -safe on even 2-week old kittens. I use the identical bottle on my super-precious 17-year-old toy poodle. If you get wormer from your vet today, it is ALWAYS pyrantel palmoate-the identical product in Nemex.
customer_reviews.author: charlie starbuck?

customer_reviews.title: did the job on my cats. I used to ...
customer_reviews.text: did the job on my cats. I used to use this as a vet tech on our hospital animals and it is a safe, effective product for your pets.
customer_reviews.author: Haze S.

customer_reviews.title: Round worms gone!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works! My puppy who is 7 weeks old had round worms. I gave him half teaspoon (he weighs 5 lb) in the morning, and by the afternoon he was pooping out dead worms! I know, gross!! Two days later, I gave him another dose, and he pooped out a couple more. Two days after that I gave his feces sample to my vet.. they called me the next morning to let me know he tested NEGATIVE for any parasites! Yay! I was so happy! Pretty sure he was too. No more round worms!
customer_reviews.author: Ivy S

customer_reviews.title: Best dewormer.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best over the counter dewormmer for pups and grown dogs. My entire family has been using it for years. It was recommended by our vet and is very safe and effective. Works for roundworm, hookworm, and ringworm. Note: This does not work for tape worms. They require different medication.
customer_reviews.author: bkeaAZ247!

customer_reviews.title: Good affordable dewormer for puppies
customer_reviews.text: This came recommended by our very experienced dog breeder (she has been breeding dogs for 50 years). We dosed our puppy with this two times and subsequent fecal samples came back clear. It seemed to work and didn't seem to bother our pup. Our vet was a bit horrified to hear we could buy this on amazon and we were deworming our dog ourselves... He wanted to charge us about $40 to basically do the same thing. This is a much better price and seems to do the job well, though keep in mind that it doesn't work to kill every type of worm...
customer_reviews.author: SoCal949

customer_reviews.title: No More Worms!
customer_reviews.text: I had to relocate to an apartment when a tree hit my house. The hound and I settled in nicely, but... apartments & the residents (and their dogs) mean fleas and other unsavory things. My Lab was 11, never had fleas or worms. I suspect she picked them up at the apartment. Some tea tree oil & Dawn dishsoap addressed the fleas, and this NEMEX 2 was awesome for the worms. I did have to go 2 months in a row to completely rid her of them, it was a nasty undertaking. I'd originally tried an OTC powdered wormer, but it didn't make a dent in her worms. The reviews of the NEMEX were spot on - knocked 'em out!
customer_reviews.author: NinaB

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed with this product!
customer_reviews.text: We saved a newborn kitten about 7 to 10 days old that was abandoned near a fence all by itself. We nursed it to health and used this product to deworm the kitten. 2 months later we took the kitten to the vet and they were very impressed with her health and she had no worms, parasites or any issues on her exam. Very happy I purchased this and I have a healthy kitten to play with!
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Works like magic
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 cats so I buy in bulk. This product is advertised for dogs but other reviewers stated using it on cats as well. So did I. It was easy to administer with a syringe, however the amount it quite large to force into a cat, especially when they are obese and heavy like mine... The very next day the poops in the litter box were FILLED with moving and dead worms so I know the product worked. Repeat treatment is recommended to kill off the rest of worms.
customer_reviews.author: Lidia

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job on roundworms in my GSD puppy
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for the first worming of my puppy. Got a good pile of "spaghetti" worms out of my GSD puppy on his first worming. It's good for roundworms, but does NOT get every type of worm out there that your dog can be exposed to. But after two treatments two weeks apart, I took a stool sample to the vet and got the report that the pup was negative for worms. So it does do a nice job on the roundworms and is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: dewormer
customer_reviews.text: My friend used this one time on a 4 month old kitten and he threw up worms the next day, I TNR cats and my friend Donna uses this with each cat that come back from spaying and she said it worked within 24 hours. I use it now on my indoor and outside cats. It works . only once ever two weeks , there are better instructions on the bottle.. I dont have to give it three times a day for a long time like most of them.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Comello

customer_reviews.title: No worms
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest dewormer, easy to use and the puppies don’t mind it either. What I mean by that is, that it most likely doesn’t taste bad or otherwise they wouldn’t take it. I use it starting at 2 weeks old and after that every two weeks till they are ready to go home. None of the puppies had worms when they went to their new home and none after that either. Their vets were very pleased. I be getting more when we are expecting again.
customer_reviews.author: Sabine Britt

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!! Vet said it did great and it does.
customer_reviews.text: I have four big dogs. And this worked for every one of them after I dog sat for a friend whose dog was not wormed. Afterwards I ordered this and treated them and at the vet they were all tested and none had worms. I will be retreating in two weeks as we have a big yard and there could be some still out there so just in case. It works !!
customer_reviews.author: D. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Didn't meet expections
customer_reviews.text: There were alot of good reviews, which is why I bought them; however, what I've discovered is they didn't work for me. My area has always been a battle with fleas, so if there's a major problem of fleas I wouldn't recommend this product. I give these vitamins to my doggy everyday and it has been longer than a month-which is also something I wasn't aware of until I bought them, it takes a month for it to be effective-and she still comes in from outside with fleas in which the fleas will stay on her until I do something about getting rid of them.
customer_reviews.author: mary geigle

customer_reviews.title: Works great and they seem to like the taste
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for years to annually deworm our two dogs. Works great and they seem to like the taste. Also for other members that have returned it because it does not come with seal just know that the manufacture does not seal them. l usually purchase it at a large animal feed and supply store and there's is no seal. Purchased this from Amazon because of the two day shipping convenience and it's a better price.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: I originally gave a bad review because the item was not sealed
customer_reviews.text: I originally gave a bad review because the item was not sealed. I went to the store and bought more off the shelf only to find that none of them are sealed. I used this product and it did as described
customer_reviews.author: Julia T.

customer_reviews.title: No safety seal??!?
customer_reviews.text: Update I am very concerned , this is second time I am ordering this and both times I receive it without a seal. ........I haven’t used product, and ordered a new one. The one I ordered had no seal and was unhappy about not knowing it it was tampered with. For consumption by 6 baby kittens, I want the safety of some sort of seal on the container
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't rid my dog of roundworms
customer_reviews.text: Been using this since he was a puppy he's had worms almost the entire time I've had him for nearly 6 months now had to turn to the vet for help. This stuff doesn't seem to work. I even bought a new bottle thinking the old one wasn't any good that I'd had for about a year. Still no improvement. They like the flavor though. Directions aren't clear for cats (I have both dogs and cats.)
customer_reviews.author: T Griffis

customer_reviews.title: This works!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this. My first time buying a deworming product online so I was very hesitant to make this purchase; however, after reading all the reviews, I decided to try it. The bottle came sealed (not like what others had mentioned). After my puppy was given the formula, she excreted about 3 small piles of roundworms since given the dewormer and is now perfectly okay! Don’t hesitate like I did. Just make the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ALANNA

customer_reviews.title: Worked right away!
customer_reviews.text: No safety seal on my bottle. Worked within 2 hours and worms were being dispelled. I used this on my pet skunks (domesticated skunks that I bought from a breeder not wild skunks) and it worked well.
customer_reviews.author: jflexi

customer_reviews.title: It’s Gentle and It Works!!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t understand the difference BUT I purchased the same supposed formula from another brand and it made the 2-week-old puppies SO SICK! I asked my mentor and she said just get the Nemex so I did and administered at three weeks. NO ISSUES! And the puppies gladly took the medicine!! Don’t get anything else!!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: I dewormed my pups with this at 2, 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: I dewormed my pups with this at 2, 4, 6. And 8 weeks...followed the rules and did see them expel round worms, however at their vet check up they still had round worms...not sure if it was my pups, or this wasn't strong enough, but it didn't rid my pups of the worms completely...still, it did help.
customer_reviews.author: briana

customer_reviews.title: Good Product/Questionable Supplier
customer_reviews.text: Product packaging looked shoddy. Label looks as though it's been removed and reapplied. Some genius thought it was a good idea to affix barcode/new item stickers across the product information on the bottle. That being said, Nemex-2 has been a good puppy wormer. Just gave our puppy his 8-week dose. He took it easily by syringe and showed no signs of digestive upset.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: I have never experienced a pet with round worms before so I am glad this was instantly effective
customer_reviews.text: We got a puppy for mothers day.. she had not been dewormed yet, ordered the dewormer and worked within 24 hours! I have never experienced a pet with round worms before so I am glad this was instantly effective.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Counts

customer_reviews.title: this medicine didn’t upset their bellies and puppies loved the taste
customer_reviews.text: Used for litter or puppies. Dewormed at 5 and 7 weeks. All their fecals were negative at 8 weeks— mom was on Heartgaurd, so that may of had an impact on their negative fecals. However, this medicine didn’t upset their bellies and puppies loved the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Dogs loved it
customer_reviews.text: Used this on a littler of 7 pups for several weeks and the mother. No issues, they all slurped it up with no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Foss

customer_reviews.title: Effective!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a litter of kittens I rescued. It was fairly easy to use - the kittens drank it up through a small dropper and I had no problems! They even began pooping out worms within the next day. I will be using this as a monthly preventative from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Care1998

customer_reviews.title: Good for Kittens too!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, my Veterinarian suggested this is safe for kittens too, the same dosage as puppies, by their weight. It took care of the problem, and I'd suggest this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Kitten deworming
customer_reviews.text: I got this to deworm my 3 week old kitten. Using some advanced math because the only measurement is 5ml per 10lbs, I was able to give it to her at 3 and 5 weeks, and she handled it well!
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie Dunlap

customer_reviews.title: Even thought the label says for dogs it works great for cats as well
customer_reviews.text: Works really well I used it for the feral cats outside. Even thought the label says for dogs it works great for cats as well.. Just look online for the dosage
customer_reviews.author: B. B.

customer_reviews.title: Used it on kittens
customer_reviews.text: Youtuber and professional kitten rescuer, kitten lady, said it was good and safe for kittens so I bought it lol. Used it on my 2 kitties and helped one pass some nasty parasites
customer_reviews.author: Selena Vielma

customer_reviews.title: Same as the Vet!
customer_reviews.text: Safest wormer for dogs & cats and its the same that the vet gives! Save yourself some time & money with this. It must taste great too because I have yet to have something not like it yet!
customer_reviews.author: Meghann1985

customer_reviews.title: Worked well on our cats, yet on the dog.
customer_reviews.text: It did work well on all the cats, either the three adults and the four kittens, but it did absolutely nothing on my 34 pounds English setter despite I respected the dosage. Overall, I'd buy it again for the cats but not for the dog.
customer_reviews.author: TeamSloan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to administer and cats didn't resist it
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work, found worms after second application. Please follow dosing which is different than just Nemex (this is Nemex-2). It is less concentrated than Nemex. Plan on using after 6-months as a follow-up. Easy to administer and cats didn't resist it.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Works immediately with an enjoyable taste for your K9
customer_reviews.text: I've just recently purchased the nemex 2 liquid dewormer for my 6 week old pup, and I must say that it works fast wonders. I thought I was going to have an issue with my pup taking the medicine, but it liked it- considering the way was licking it from the syringe. After a few hours I was able to see the expired worms in his stool. I would highly recommend this product, but still take your pup/ dog to the vet for proper care and monitoring of this matter
customer_reviews.author: Kiamesha Greene

customer_reviews.title: Good puppy wormer
customer_reviews.text: Came in time best price at time bought. Was unsealed unlike ones I bought at store. But bottle was full and in good condition. So far so good as pups only have had one worming.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This prevents worms in puppies and safe for momma
customer_reviews.text: My girl had a liter of five pups. I used this with all of them regularly using a syringe to squirt in their tiny mouths and none of them had worms!!! This product works and is a great price
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: This product worked really well! After my dog had her puppies, it helped with her bloating. She also loved the taste! Very afforable!
customer_reviews.author: Mr Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Better than any other at home dog wormer
customer_reviews.text: This is the best dog wormer We have ever used and it is so hard to find locally tractor supply is always sold out and we always have to order it but it’s definitely worth the wait
customer_reviews.author: Erica Covarrubias

customer_reviews.title: You can use it on kittens
customer_reviews.text: They ask you about the case but I can't answer that because I've never tasted it and I hope it kill the worms
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Excellent dewormer for the dogs
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and effective . I've used this dewormer for years and this is the best price and delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Best product on the market
customer_reviews.text: This is the best I have ever used, many years sticking with it. Dogs love it, no mess, no fuss, just follow directions.
customer_reviews.author: Long 2 Haul

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: This de-wormer works well - got rid of the puppies' worms right away. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Still curious
customer_reviews.text: Not sure still haven’t given second dose. My dog had zero issues just licking it up cat however nah......wanted NOTHING to do with it. No seal. We will see what happens
customer_reviews.author: Sundee Vissering

customer_reviews.title: Got the job done
customer_reviews.text: It’s been 2 months since I’ve had this product and it worked perfectly. It was simple giving it to my dog, with no hassle but every dog varies. It got the job done and good even if you’re wary that your dog might have works.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie A.

customer_reviews.title: That is doing its job to PROTECT!
customer_reviews.text: All these questions can only be answered by my shepherd! Easy to use, yes by me. Most important is that it fully protects.
customer_reviews.author: Viviane B

customer_reviews.title: quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: Received box sealed but no safety foil on bottle. Cap would not close tight after opening bottle so didn't use product.
customer_reviews.author: DGrimes

customer_reviews.title: My GoTo puppy wormer
customer_reviews.text: Use this as directed...don't skip weeks thinking you didn't see anything so you don't need it. Follow the schedule and it does a great job of giving puppies a good start.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: We have used Nemex for more than 35 years on all types of dogs. It works! We do recommend this good product.
customer_reviews.author: Steve and Kathleen Elder

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Give to my dogs periodically & can tell a difference afterwards, use it more preventively than anything else, they also like the taste so it’s easy to administer
customer_reviews.author: becky garthwaite

customer_reviews.title: Safe and palatable medicine.
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of reading, and our Breeder highly recommended. Excellent personal and professional review, and our pup loved it.
customer_reviews.author: RNBAYSIDE

customer_reviews.title: packaging bummer
customer_reviews.text: no insert and cant read instructions because a bar code was placed over the tiny writing
customer_reviews.author: jean p west

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm and my dog will actually lick this from the spoon!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Knox

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfect
customer_reviews.text: Worked for exactly what I needed it.. probably saved my puppy’s life..
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Wish it had a dropper included
customer_reviews.text: Overall its a great dewormer that my dog doesn't mind taking at all. I just wish it had included a dropper for easier use. It tastes good enough that she readily laps it up from a spoon or when mixed with a bit of food.
customer_reviews.author: Blair

customer_reviews.title: Nasty worms
customer_reviews.text: I have pekingese dogs and this completely eliminated the worms in my female, I assume she got them because of a few fleas which we promptly took care of as well. Only needed one dose! Glad this is safe to use on pregnant females and the price on amazon is great!
customer_reviews.author: Poke

customer_reviews.title: Puppy thinks this is candy
customer_reviews.text: Love that this is so easy to give our dog. I mix it up with a little bit of water and he laps it up in seconds.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: They love it. very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Dogs love it. I used it on both puppies and mama.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Best heart worm medicine!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because this has been used by multiple generations for our dogs. This is the best heart worm medicine on the market!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S. Pegram

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done for a fair price
customer_reviews.text: Way cheaper than a visit to the vet and it tastes so good my puppy licks it right off the spoon.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Good product for puppies
customer_reviews.text: Puppies take to it easy but you will need to get a feeding syringe to dispense it
customer_reviews.author: kyle johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I use this for both my dogs and cats it works very well for all parasites.
customer_reviews.author: margie richards

customer_reviews.title: You will not regret this purchase
customer_reviews.text: This has worked wonders for my new puppy! Started as soon as we got him, and have now used it a total of three times. I will be purchasing the bigger bottle to give to all my dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Chin-gon

customer_reviews.title: Bought for puppies and they loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Great wormer and smells good too! My puppies loved the taste and licked up every last drop.
customer_reviews.author: Fosterwife

customer_reviews.title: Effective dewormer
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for my kittens. They hated the taste and actually gagged after administration, but I had wet food ready to wash down the flavor lol. Treated once every two weeks and again at 6 months old. Worm free and happy. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: This works!!
customer_reviews.text: Gave my four cats two rounds after finding a worm after one of them puked. Got rid of the worms and everyone is doing great now. You have to figure out the amount according to their weight. A veterinarian friend recommended this.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Worked for our Puppy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as promised. Product accepted by our puppy and seems to work as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Anini Mike

customer_reviews.title: Product works well.
customer_reviews.text: Fast working and safe, couldn’t ask for more.We will order again.
customer_reviews.author: konadreamer

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I use this product with my puppy and adult dogs. it’s the only one I use. It works great! This was a great price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Same Dewormers vet use. Awesome Deal, no vet fees
customer_reviews.text: We use these on our puppies starting at 2 weeks for 3 weeks straight then switch over to Safe Guard (for goats), and all of our puppies have been parasite free and absolutely healthy and striving..
customer_reviews.author: Alan C. Alejandro

customer_reviews.title: I got nemex-2 recommended by a friend so I decided to try it ...
customer_reviews.text: I got nemex-2 recommended by a friend so I decided to try it and it’s been great my puppies drink it without any problems so that’s a big plus and the directions of use or easy to read and understand it’s a great product and I’d recommend it to anyone also.
customer_reviews.author: salvador hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Good deal through Prime.
customer_reviews.text: Price is not that much less than the local farm supply store but still a good deal.

customer_reviews.title: Puppies like the flavor
customer_reviews.text: Our puppies liked the flavor, so it was easy to give it to them in a syringe.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: No saftey seal!!!
customer_reviews.text: No saftey seal on the bottle! I cannot trust this product because I don’t know what’s been done to it with no deal. That makes me super nervous to give to my puppies.
customer_reviews.author: Meish

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, cats ate it easily
customer_reviews.text: Didn't have an issue getting it down, seems to have worked.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda C.

customer_reviews.title: The product works .Worms gone, no noted side effects.
customer_reviews.text: The product is a bit expensive. It needs to come in a larger bottle, with a slight discount. I needed to purchase THREE bottles to have the correct amount for my dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Dottie Shifflett

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I bought other deworming products that do not seem to work at all, and this is the only product I found that seems to actually get rid of the worms. I have ordered it twice and recommend it to family and friends that need to deworming there dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Beingme

customer_reviews.title: Nemex is #1
customer_reviews.text: Great product and would highly recommend it to any pet owner.:.

customer_reviews.title: Good product but more expensive
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff but it's cheaper to get the big bottle of Pyrantel
customer_reviews.author: Got pets

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product, thank you
customer_reviews.text: This works miracles. My pups were worm free, healthy and gaining weight within three days of the first dose. Fantastic product, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this to anyone who absolutely adores their pets
customer_reviews.text: This product not only eradicated the worm infestation, but keeps my pets free and clear month after month. I recommend this to anyone who absolutely adores their pets!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy Wormer
customer_reviews.text: Excellent wormer. Used it for years. Most dogs and puppies like the taste so it’s easy to administer. Tried a generic version a while back and the puppies thought I was trying to poison them. lol. The original is the BEST.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Albert

customer_reviews.title: BEST DEWORMER OUT THERE !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely lovvvvveeeeeeee this dewormer it Works !!!!!! I will recommend to any one . I treated my dog and her litter of 12 puppies who are 3 weeks old ! I'm still Amazed of how this really worked .

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work well!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice follow-up to a regular worming for a puppy worked well for us.

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Works great! The 2 chihuahuas loved it, no problems taking it.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Coover

customer_reviews.title: Nemex-2 The BEST!!
customer_reviews.text: Nemex-2 my old standby. It's been working for many years. Puppies are always checked by vets here and when their new families take them home and to their vets they are free of worms. Reasonably priced and effective.
customer_reviews.author: Discoverygal2

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Didn't kill any worms. Had to buy a different medicine
customer_reviews.author: Bekah

customer_reviews.title: Item was poor quality product.  Not effective as i bought at a tractor supply store
customer_reviews.text: I used this as noted on bottle for my shih tzu puppies and they still have hookworms. I have bought this product from my local tractor supply and never had an issue. I would like a credit because i had to take pups to the vet and got a huge vet bill. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Tammy costner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best wormer. We have been using this stuff as needed for the last eight years.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Shouldn’t this item be sealed??? Feel uncomfortable administering it to my fur babies.

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: I have a 10 lb pug chihuahua that was feeling poorly, so I bought a liquid wormer,( because you can't get a pill in Gator), at Walmart. It didn't work. So I sent off for Nemex-2, in 24 hours he was up and fighting. Great med, does what it says, use it.
customer_reviews.author: mudhog2

customer_reviews.title: No more worms
customer_reviews.text: Did the job! Sprinkled it on my dog's food for 2 days and his worms were gone ny the third day. Couldn't have asked for better results from this product!

customer_reviews.title: Puppy likes it
customer_reviews.text: Used on puppy they love the taste and will take it willingly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have been using Nemex 2 for years when worming my puppies
customer_reviews.author: cathy wojcik

customer_reviews.title: Easy to give and works great.
customer_reviews.text: I raise mini Goldendoodle puppies. They are started on this at 2 weeks and they love the taste. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy D

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did the job in my little puppy, and was palatable to him when I administered it .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked like magic when all other store bought meds did not
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent wormer!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent wormer. Have used it for my dogs for years!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Renee

customer_reviews.title: My puppies love the taste and the pricing is a great deal ...
customer_reviews.text: My puppies love the taste and the pricing is a great deal as I combine this along with with 0.05% Ivermectin (www.heartwormprevention.com) instead of using Heartgard plus. Saved hundreds of $ year.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product! The puppies love it, and lick every last drop from the syringe. It's a little pricey, but it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Edward M.

product_meta.title: Nemex-2 Wormer 2oz
feature_bullets: Liquid wormer removes large roundworms and hookworms in dogs and puppies
Dog must be at least 2 weeks old
